titles.title: Western Balkans Democracy and Prosperity Act
Western Balkans Democracy and Prosperity Act
To encourage increased trade and investment between the United States and the countries in the Western Balkans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
